changeSet.author: M_Zhivotovskiy
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE public.address_town ( id int8 NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY( INCREMENT BY 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 9223372036854775807 START 1 CACHE 1 NO CYCLE), district_id int8 NULL, "name" varchar NULL, address_subject_id int8 NULL, code varchar NULL, CONSTRAINT address_town_pk PRIMARY KEY (id) );
